description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to enable access of Nicaragua to efficient sovereign risk insurance associated with geophysical and climate-related events.

title.narrative: Nicaragua as member of CCRIF is eligible for catastrophe risk coverage and has received payment within a month of the occurrence ofa covered (insured) event
Policies provide increasing insurance coverage and/or lower attachment point (insurance deductible) for a given premium amount
CCRIF premiums for Nicaragua are lower than the simulated price for a comparable coverage purchased individually in the market
